short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It loads Premium content of Medium blogs, by opening an incognito window in the background and replacing the content.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple chrome extension that loads Premium content of Medium blog of the current tab
